text:
[Verse]
Shadows dance on the wall
Night falls we stand tall
Starry sky feels so small
Underneath we lose control

[Verse 2]
Heartbeat in every beat
Night air feels so sweet
City lights blend the street
Feel the rhythm in our feet

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows on the floor
We don't need nothing more
Music rising through the core
Echoes open every door

[Verse 3]
Lights flash colors collide
Magic happens when we glide
Inner glow we cannot hide
Our spirits side by side

[Verse 4]
Time stops endless groove
With every step we prove
Boundaries we can remove
Feel the night as we move

[Chorus]
Dancing shadows on the floor
We don't need nothing more
Music rising through the core
Echoes open every door
title: Dancing Shadows
